sentences.en: And would you believe it, he's younger than me!
sentences.cn: 你信吗？他比我年轻！

sentences.en: Circumstances dictated that they played a defensive rather than attacking game.
sentences.cn: 比赛形势决定了他们要打防守战而不是进攻战。

sentences.en: Divorce is more common than it was a generation ago.
sentences.cn: 现在离婚比上一代人常见了。

sentences.en: Fewer than 7% of asylum seekers are accepted as political refugees.
sentences.cn: 寻求避难者中有不到7%的人被视作政治难民。

sentences.en: He used me worse than ever.
sentences.cn: 他对待我比以前更坏了。

sentences.en: If it costs more than $60, I won’t buy it.
sentences.cn: 如果价格超过60美元，我就不买了。

sentences.en: In 1986 more than three million were receiving unemployment benefit.
sentences.cn: 1986年，有300多万人领取失业救济金。

sentences.en: It will produce electricity more cheaply than a nuclear plant.
sentences.cn: 它的发电成本要比核电站低。

sentences.en: Jovial ladies chivvy you into ordering more than you can eat!
sentences.cn: 热情的女招待会一再推荐，最后点的餐多到吃不下!

sentences.en: Locking up men does nothing more than keep them off the streets.
sentences.cn: 把这些人关起来只是做到了不让他们上街而已。

sentences.en: Natalie was prettier than her sister.
sentences.cn: 纳塔莉比她姐姐漂亮。

sentences.en: She felt she could console the child better than anyone else.
sentences.cn: 她认为自己比任何人都能更好地安慰这孩子。

sentences.en: She had woken even earlier than usual.
sentences.cn: 她甚至比平时醒得更早。

sentences.en: She matured earlier than him.
sentences.cn: 她比他成熟得早。

sentences.en: She's got a great voice and is singing better than ever.
sentences.cn: 她的嗓音非常好，现在的唱功比以往任何时候都要好。

sentences.en: Sue screamed, not loudly, more in surprise than terror.
sentences.cn: 休尖叫起来，声音不大，吃惊多于恐惧。

sentences.en: T-shirts are a nice little earner and it's better than the dole.
sentences.cn: 卖T恤衫来钱容易，比领救济金好。

sentences.en: The total cost of the project would be more than $240 million.
sentences.cn: 该项目的总成本会超过2.4亿美元。

sentences.en: Their replies were no more than grunts of acknowledgement.
sentences.cn: 他们所谓的回答不过是表示承认的咕哝罢了。

sentences.en: There were more people there than I expected.
sentences.cn: 那里的人比我预想的要多。

sentences.en: They insist on tastier chocolate than the anaemic British stuff.
sentences.cn: 他们坚持要比淡而无味的英国货味道更好的巧克力。

sentences.en: They were more concerned about the dogs' welfare than a clean getaway.
sentences.cn: 他们更加关心那些狗的安危，而非自己如何干净利落地脱身。

sentences.en: This issue, more than any other, has divided her cabinet.
sentences.cn: 主要是这一问题使她的内阁产生了分歧。

sentences.en: You need that money more than I do.
sentences.cn: 你比我更需要那笔钱。

words.tran_cn: 比（用于形容词、副词的比较级之后）；除…外（用于other等之后）；与其…（用于 rather等之后）；一…就（用于 no sooner等之后）

trans.tran_en: used when comparing two things, people, situations etc
used when comparing two things, people, situations etc

trans.tran_cn: 比（用于比较级之后），多/小/少于，（表示一事紧跟另一事发生）就
